cause.description:
Kaleb Schwade is the only son of Kristy and Josh. At five months old, he experienced Shaken Baby Syndrome by the hand of a babysitter. He has been in the ICU since May 9th, and is fighting for his life. This page is set up to help Kaleb and his family. Kristy and Josh spend mostly all of their free time at the hospital aching for a moment to hold their now sixth month old son.This page is set up so that YOU can play an active role in helping Kaleb and his family. The most important way to help is to PRAY for Kaleb's recovery! Secondly, you can donate funds to cover medical expenses, lawyer fees, and other expenses by donating to the Help Kaleb Fund. 100% of funds will be used to help Kaleb's family. Please make checks payable to Kristy Schwade, and send to PO Box 291494, TAMPA, FL 33687-1494 OR You can donate by credit card via PayPal to helpkaleb@hotmail.com (Go to http://www.paypal.com , send money, type helpkaleb@hotmail.com in the section "to".)
1. to help Kalebs recovery go smoother
2. to help ease the pain of the parents and to let them know that there are people out there who care
3. to make people aware that shaken baby syndrome is not something to be taken lightly
